remarks: A Hilbert lattice has a height of at least 4.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2011.)
statement:
hlhgt4.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
hlhgt4.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
hlhgt4.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
hlhgt4.u $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
hlhgt4 $p |- ( K e. HL -> E. x e. B E. y e. B E. z e. B ( ( .0. .< x /\ x .< y ) /\ ( y .< z /\ z .< .1. ) ) ) $.
$d B x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
